existing_features.title: Add a 'Download PDF' button to the itinerary view (PlanTrip page / ItineraryTimeline component) that allows users to download their generated day-by-day itinerary as a formatted PDF file. The PDF should include the destination name, duration, travel style, and the full day-by-day activity breakdown.

Add a Gemini-powered 'Explore More' section to the PlanTrip page that appears after a trip itinerary is generated. This section should use the Google Gemini API to fetch and display additional personalized travel suggestions, local tips, or hidden insights relevant to the selected destination and travel preferences.
